mapper.select: SELECT q.ID, q.PUNISH_ID, q.PUNISH_TIME, q.PUNISH_STYLE, q.PARTY_NAME, (select name from organizes_ciq t where t.org_code=q.PORT_ORG_CODE) as PORT_ORG_CODE, (select name from DEPTMENTS t where t.code=q.PORT_DEPT_CODE) as PORT_DEPT_CODE, qlp.ILLEGAL_ACT as ILLEGAL_CONTENT, q.ILLEGAL_OBJECT, q.IDENTIFI_STYLE, q.IDENTIFI_NUMBER, q.ADDRESS, q.LEGAL_REPRESENT, q.LEGAL_REPRESENT_PHONE, q.ILLEGAL_ADDRESS, q.ILLEGAL_TIME, q.PARTY_REPRESENT_PHONE, q.PARTY_ASSIGN, qlp.ILLEGAL_BASIS, qlp.PUNISH_BASIS, q.CUR_PSN_SIGN, q.LAW_EXECUTOR, q.WARNNING_CONTENT, q.PUNISH_STYLE, q.PARTY_REPRESENT, q.BANK_CARD, q.RECONSIDER, q.PUNISH_MONEY, q.FORFEIT_PAY_STYLE FROM QLC_LOCALE_PUNISH q LEFT JOIN QLC_LEGAL_PROVISIONS qlp ON qlp.code=q.ILLEGAL_CONTENT AND qlp.punish_type='1' WHERE q.PUNISH_ID=#{punish_id}

select t.*,p.illegal_basis,p.punish_basis, (select o.name from ORGANIZES o where o.org_code=t.port_org_code) as port_org, (select d.name from DEPTMENTS d where d.code=t.port_dept_code) as port_dept from QLC_LOCALE_PUNISH t left join Qlc_Legal_Provisions p on t.ILLEGAL_CONTENT=p.code and qlp.punish_type='1' where t.ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into QLC_VIDEO_FILE_EVENT ( ID, PROC_MAIN_ID, PROC_TYPE, FILE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE ) values ( CreateGUID(), #{proc_main_id}, #{proc_type}, #{file_type}, #{file_name}, #{create_user}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select count(1) from qlc_locale_punish where punish_id = #{punish_id}
